QuestData.Title: Rocky Relations
QuestData.Description: <Norsala reaches to the ground in an attempt to discern Diamant's location, but jumps back in shock after a moment's contact.>$B$BMy! Dat was unexpected. Diamant ain't far at all. When I reached out ta him, he spoke back wit me and told me where we could be finin' him. Head towards tha northeastern edge of the Jagged Wastes - Diamant will be expectin' ya.$B$B$n, be careful. It may be unlike an earth bein' to lay an ambush, but it was unlike dem to siege the temple in da first place.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Diamant the Patient at the northeast edge of the Jagged Wastes.
QuestData.RewardText: Ah... you must be the $r that I was expecting.$B$BYou have come on behalf of the Earthen Ring then?
